actions.text: Amendment SA 1710 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1710 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bingaman. (consideration:  CR S11539-11544; text:  CR S11541) To limit the availability of funds for the Advanced Concepts Initiative of the National Nuclear Security Administration pending a report on activities under the initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1710 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1710 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bingaman.

purpose: To limit the availability of funds for the Advanced Concepts Initiative of the National Nuclear Security Administration pending a report on activities under the initiative.
